QuestData.Title: Watershed Patrol
QuestData.Description: My post is here on the tower, $n, and I cannot leave it. I need someone to go out there and help the people who are still trapped in the river's overflow.$b$bCan I count on you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Southfury Watershed and help the people you saw in the spyglass.
QuestData.RewardText: I used that trick you taught me with the spyglass, and I watched you running around down there. Quite impressive!$b$bHow'd you make the old woman fly, by the way?
